articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Netflix’s ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’ Is No ‘One Piece,’ Splits Fans And Critics - Forbes
articles.description: Netflix’s live-action remake of Avatar: The Last Airbender has seen something of a mixed reception, but very high viewership, debuting at #1 on the service
articles.content:
Avatar
Netflix
Netflixs live-action remake of Avatar: The Last Airbender has seen something of a mixed reception, but very high viewership, debuting at #1 on the service in dozens of countries.
